Which undergraduate courses are offered?: B.Tech in Computer Science & Engineering, B.Tech in Information Technology, B.Tech in Electrical Engineering, B.Tech in Mechanical Engineering, B.Tech in Electronics & Communication Engineering, B.Tech in Automobile Engineering
What is the eligibility for undergraduat: JEE Main and MP DTE Counselling
Which postgraduate courses are offered?: M.Tech in Electronics & Communication Engineering, M.Tech in Automobile Engineering, MCA
What is the eligibility for postgraduate: GATE for M.Tech, MP DTE Counselling for MCA
What are the main buildings in the RJIT: Main Block, Central Library, Hostels (APJ Kalam, CV Raman, Kalpana Chawla), Laboratories, Canteen, Transport Facility
What facilities does RJIT campus provide: Smart Classrooms, High-speed Internet (1 Gbps), Sports Complex, Auditorium, Medical Facility
Which labs are available at RJIT?: Data Science Lab, Robotics Lab, Automobile Engineering Lab, Electronics Lab, Computer Lab
Which departments are available at RJIT?: Computer Science & Engineering, Information Technology, Electrical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Electronics & Communication Engineering, Automobile Engineering
What hostel facilities are provided?: Separate hostels for boys and girls, Mess with vegetarian and non-vegetarian options, 24/7 Wi-Fi, Recreational rooms, 24/7 security
An annual cultural and technical fest featuring workshops, seminars, and competitions.
What was the latest event in the annual: Model United Nations - MANTHAN-2021 on 2021-12-15: A simulation of UN proceedings with student delegates representing different countries.
Date: 2024-11-10. Description: A developer festival organized by GDG Gwalior, featuring workshops and tech talks..
Date: 2025-05-19. Description: A patriotic march organized by RJIT faculty, students, and BSF personnel..
What sports facilities are available?: Football Ground, Basketball Court, Volleyball Court, Indoor Badminton Court, Table Tennis
What sports clubs exist at RJIT?: Sports Club, Fitness Club, Adventure Club
